"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"RewardTransferFailedL","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"sentAmount","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"minRequiredAmount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"StakeBelowMinimumL","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"message","type":"string"}],"name":"ZeroAddressL","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tokenId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"ZeroNFTOwnerL","type":"error"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tokenId","type":"uint256"}],"name":"ZeroRewardAmountL","type":"error"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Simone Di Cola","custom:security-contact":"security@swapcast.com","details":"Functions in this library act on the Market storage struct defined in PredictionManager.      This library centralizes the core business logic for prediction markets to improve code organization,      reduce duplication, and facilitate testing. It handles operations like recording predictions,      resolving markets, and calculating rewards.","errors":{"AlreadyPredictedL(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"marketId":"The ID of the market on which the user has already predicted.","user":"The address of the user who has already made a prediction."}}],"ClaimFailedNoStakeForOutcomeL(uint256,uint8)":[{"params":{"marketId":"The ID of the market with no stakes for the outcome.","outcome":"The outcome with no stakes."}}],"FeeTransferFailedL(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"amount":"The fee amount that failed to transfer.","treasuryAddress":"The address of the treasury that was supposed to receive the fee."}}],"MarketAlreadyResolvedL(uint256)":[{"params":{"marketId":"The ID of the market that is already resolved."}}],"MarketExpiredL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"currentTime":"The current block timestamp.","expirationTime":"The expiration timestamp of the market.","marketId":"The ID of the expired market."}}],"MarketNotResolvedL(uint256)":[{"params":{"marketId":"The ID of the market that is not yet resolved."}}],"MarketNotYetExpiredL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"currentTime":"The current block timestamp.","expirationTime":"The expiration timestamp of the market.","marketId":"The ID of the market that has not yet expired."}}],"NotWinningNFTL(uint256,uint8,uint8)":[{"params":{"predictedOutcome":"The outcome that was predicted.","tokenId":"The ID of the NFT that did not predict the winning outcome.","winningOutcome":"The actual winning outcome."}}],"PriceOracleStaleL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"currentTime":"The current block timestamp.","lastUpdateTime":"The timestamp of the last oracle update.","maxStaleness":"The maximum allowed staleness in seconds."}}],"RewardTransferFailedL(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"amount":"The amount that failed to transfer.","recipient":"The address that was supposed to receive the reward."}}],"StakeBelowMinimumL(uint256,uint256)":[{"params":{"minRequiredAmount":"The minimum required stake amount.","sentAmount":"The amount sent by the user."}}],"ZeroAddressL(string)":[{"params":{"message":"A descriptive message explaining the context of the zero address error."}}],"ZeroNFTOwnerL(uint256)":[{"params":{"tokenId":"The ID of the NFT with a zero owner address."}}],"ZeroRewardAmountL(uint256)":[{"params":{"tokenId":"The ID of the NFT for which the reward was calculated."}}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"MarketLogic Library","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AlreadyPredictedL(address,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a user attempts to make a prediction for a market they have already predicted on."}],"AmountCannotBeZeroL()":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to record a prediction with zero stake amount."}],"ClaimFailedNoStakeForOutcomeL(uint256,uint8)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to claim a reward but there are no stakes for the outcome."}],"FeeTransferFailedL(address,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the transfer of a fee to the treasury fails."}],"MarketAlreadyResolvedL(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to perform an action on a market that is already resolved."}],"MarketExpiredL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to record a prediction for a market that has already expired."}],"MarketNotResolvedL(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to claim a reward for a market that is not yet resolved."}],"MarketNotYetExpiredL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to resolve a market that has not yet expired."}],"NotWinningNFTL(uint256,uint8,uint8)":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to claim a reward for an NFT that did not predict the winning outcome."}],"PriceOracleStaleL(uint256,uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the price data from the oracle is stale."}],"RewardTransferFailedL(address,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the transfer of a reward to the user fails."}],"StakeBelowMinimumL(uint256,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the stake amount is below the minimum required amount."}],"ZeroAddressL(string)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an operation is attempted with a zero address where it's not allowed."}],"ZeroNFTOwnerL(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when the NFT owner address is zero."}],"ZeroRewardAmountL(uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when a calculated reward amount is unexpectedly zero."}]},"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"Provides the core logic for operating on individual prediction
